name: Princess Pain
description:
Talk to the princess before very level by walking near her and pressing the down arrow key to cycle through her dialogue. Then, go back to the doorway and press the down arrow key to proceed to the level. At the end of the level, press the down arrow key on the floating object to continue.

Controls:

Left & right arrows - move
Up arrow - jump
Down arrow - interact
Escape - pause

Note: this is very unpolished since I was only able to work on it for half of the jam :(
